about_the_game:
In the heart of a post-apocalyptic world, where civilization has crumbled and the dead roam the earth, lies the setting of our epic zombie game. This isn't just any ordinary survival horror experience, it's an immersive, adrenaline-fueled adventure where every decision could mean life or death.

The undead uprising thrusts players into a vast open-world teeming with hordes of the undead. From desolate city streets to overgrown forests, every corner of the world is filled with danger and mystery. Players must navigate through the ruins of once-thriving metropolises, scavenging for resources, forging alliances, and fighting off relentless waves of zombies.

At its core, it's is a survival game, where players must manage their hunger, thirst, and fatigue while also contending with the ever-present threat of the undead. Whether you're holed up in a makeshift shelter or braving the dangers of the wilderness, every moment is a test of skill and strategy.

But surviving isn't enough, to truly thrive in this unforgiving world, players must band together with other survivors to form alliances, build fortified settlements, and reclaim territory from the undead horde. With a robust crafting system, players can scavenge materials to craft weapons, fortifications, and even vehicles to aid in their fight for survival.

The game features a dynamic day-night cycle, with nights bringing increased danger as more powerful and relentless zombie types emerge. Players must use stealth, cunning, and firepower to survive the darkness, or risk being overwhelmed by the undead.

The game offers players the option to team up with npc's to tackle the challenges of the apocalypse together. Whether you're exploring the vast open world, engaging in intense firefights with the undead, or competing against other survivor factions for resources and territory, every moment is filled with tension and excitement.

Are you ready to face the horrors of the undead and carve out your own path in a world gone mad? Join the undead uprising and prove that humanity will not go quietly into the night.

content_descriptors.notes: Graphic and realistic-looking depictions of physical conflict. May involve extreme and/or realistic blood, gore, weapons and depictions of human injury and death.

name: Good Luck Citizen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Graphics: Nvidia 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 GB available space

This isn't just any ordinary survival horror experience; it's an immersive, adrenaline-fueled adventure where every decision could mean life or death.
